snippet: The remarks by the governor of Xinjiang signaled that the Communist Party would tighten security throughout the region in reaction to a knife attack that killed 29 civilians.
abstract: Xinjiang, China, Gov Nur Bekri says Communist Party will crack down on separatist groups and tighten security measures throughout region in response to knife attack that killed 29 people in train station there.
lead_paragraph: The remarks by the governor of Xinjiang signaled that the Communist Party would tighten security throughout the region in reaction to a knife attack that killed 29 civilians.

headline.main: Chinese Governor Signals Crackdown on Separatists
headline.print_headline: Chinese Governor Signals Crackdown on Separatists
